modShortDescription: Ever wondered, why you can't spill full jars? Now you can do it with this 7 Days to Die mod. Simply scrap the full jar to an empty jar.
modDescription:
Ever wondered, why you can’t spill full jars? Now you can do it with this 7 Days to Die mod. Simply scrap the full jar to an empty jar. The only downside: Jars are not scrap or smeltable anymore. But honestly: Did anyone do this for real – not counting accidentally scrapping them? Claymore never did. So here we go.

Compatibility: **A18+**

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/1uhvq4rswgjxhuo/Claymore_Spill_Full_Jars.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
